CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK(Contact__c)=true, "",
if(Contact__r.IsPersonAccount = true, (Contact__r.Account.BillingStreet +", "+ Contact__r.Account.BillingCity +", "+ Contact__r.Account.BillingState +" "+ Contact__r.Account.BillingPostalCode & BR() & Contact__r.Account.Phone +" Work " & BR() & Contact__r.MobilePhone +" Mobile " & BR() & Contact__r.Email), (Contact__r.MailingStreet +", "+ Contact__r.MailingCity +", "+ Contact__r.MailingState +" "+ Contact__r.MailingPostalCode & BR() & Contact__r.Phone +" Work " & BR() & Contact__r.MobilePhone +" Mobile " & BR() & Contact__r.Email)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Information is carried over from Contact's Mailing Address.
CustomField.label: Contact Information
